hibernate-mapping.query: select distinct mbh from MBHeader mbh where mbh.state.previous.value = 'APPROVED' and trunc(mbh.state.createdDate) <= ? and mbh.workOrder.id = ? and mbh.workOrderEstimate.id = ?

select distinct mbh from MBHeader mbh left join mbh.mbBills as reg left join reg.egBillregister.state as state where mbh.state.previous.value = 'APPROVED' and mbh.workOrder.id = ? and (reg.egBillregister is not null or state.value != 'CANCELLED') and reg.egBillregister.billtype=?

select reg.egBillregister.billdate from MBHeader mbh left join mbh.mbBills as reg where mbh.state.previous.value = 'APPROVED' and mbh.workOrder.id = ? and reg is not null order by reg.egBillregister.billdate desc
select reg.egBillregister.id from MBHeader mbh left join mbh.mbBills as reg where mbh.workOrderEstimate.id = ? and reg is not null order by reg.egBillregister.id desc
select mbh from MBHeader mbh left join mbh.mbBills mbBills where mbh.state.previous.value = 'APPROVED' and mbBills is not null and mbBills.egBillregister.id = ?

select mbh from MBHeader mbh where mbh.workOrderEstimate.id=? and mbh.state.previous.value!='CANCELLED' and mbh.workOrderEstimate.id not in (select mb.workOrderEstimate.id from MBHeader mb left join mb.mbBills mbBills where mbBills.egBillregister.billtype='Final Bill' and mbBills.egBillregister.billstatus!='CANCELLED')
Select distinct mbHeader from MBHeader mbHeader left join mbHeader.mbBills mbBills where mbBills.egBillregister.id=?
Select distinct mbHeader.mbRefNo from MBHeader mbHeader where mbHeader.state.previous.value = 'APPROVED' and mbHeader.workOrderEstimate.id=?
Select distinct mbHeader from MBHeader mbHeader left join mbHeader.mbBills mbBills where mbHeader.workOrderEstimate.id = ? and mbBills.egBillregister.id<=?
